replies.body:
Hey DLTD Stuart! 

This is a known issue and we're looking into it. :) In the future, please use the Report a Bug section on the boards to report things like this, so they don't get lost! Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I7PNEmpY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-05T17:41:00.490+0000)
>
> Hey DLTD Stuart! 
> 
> This is a known issue and we're looking into it. :) In the future, please use the Report a Bug section on the boards to report things like this, so they don't get lost! Thanks!

Oh okay! Thank you for the response and I just wasn't sure if it was a so called "bug" so I put it in this section. I'll be sure to use the bug section next time
Thanks! Any kind of defect, or anything that doesn't look right can be reported there - we'll definitely see it! ^-^
